resources.string: Hi, I am John Doe, pursuing my B.Tech in Information Technology at VNR VJIET College. I have a strong foundation in web development, working extensively with technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React and Node.js. I have experience building full-stack applications using the MERN stack. Additionally, I have hands-on expertise in Android app development, leveraging Java and Kotlin. I am also familiar with cloud platforms like AWS and have dabbled in machine learning, implementing models for data analysis and entity extraction. I constantly strive to expand my skill set and explore new technologies.
• Web Development: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React and Node.js.
• Android Development: Experienced in building mobile applications using Java and Kotlin.
• Machine Learning: Knowledgeable in implementing machine learning models for data analysis and entity extraction.
